title: NIVEA Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Energy Radiance Boost Night Cream, Rich Night Cream with Vitamin C, 50ml, Packaging may vary

features: RADIANT SKIN OVERNIGHT: This night moisturiser from NIVEA is designed to deliver results after just 1 use. Users have reported dull and tired-looking skin is intensely moisturised after 24 hours*
REDUCE FINE LINES: The anti-wrinkle cream can visibly reduce fine lines, and firm skin** after 4 weeks of use.
INNOVATIVE FORMULA: The rejuvenating skincare formula uses pure Q10 to correct wrinkles from within, as well as 7X vitamin C*** and guarana extract to refresh, revitalise and rejuvenate the skin
HOW TO APPLY: Apply the vitamin C cream nightly on a cleansed face. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Follow up with our other Q10 products for even more visible results
CLINICALLY TESTED: Backed with 25 years of research, NIVEA scientists studied with more than 60,000 users to improve our products. This night moisturiser has been clinically tested and approved
description: Product Description NIVEA Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Energy Radiance Boost Night Cream (50ml) - Rejuvenating night cream for brighter skin Recharge your skin overnight with this rich anti-wrinkle moisturiser from NIVEA. Featuring pure Q10 to boost the skin's regenerative properties and firm skin, Vitamin C to improve brightness and radiance, and Guarana Extract to overall boost the complexion, this night cream has everything necessary to help you look your best. Our innovative formula is specially designed to work overnight when skin is more receptive. Product Benefits: Radiance-boosting night cream Results in the first 24 hours* Q10, vitamin C and guarana extract Visible reduction in fine lines and wrinkles Dermatologically tested *89% women confirm: The product recharges the skin overnight (Self Assessment, 4 weeks study, 107 women, 2022) **Self-assessment, 107 women, 2022 Ingredients Aqua, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii BUTTER, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Methylpropanediol, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Cetearyl Isononanoate, Cocoglycerides, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Ubiquinone, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Caffeine, Paullinia Cupana Seed Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Creatine, 1-Methylhydantoin-2-Imide, Panthenol, Pantolactone, Maltodextrin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum, CI 16035 Safety Warning avoid direct eye contact Manufacturer Contact Information Beiersdorf UK Ltd. Trinity Central Trinity Park Bickenhill Lane Birmingham B37 7ES See more
